definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נֶעְתַּם]] [[אָָרֶץ]] Is 9:18 (gatama is be clogged in speech, gatmun suffocating heat, magtuwmun burned by heat; hence Thes scorched, but derived sense dub.; v. RS:JPhil. xiii. 61 f.);—read perhaps [[נִצְּתָה]] (√ [[יׇחַת]]) is burned up, cf. RS:l. c., Krochm Kit Che:Hpt.
